Made from preserved crimson worm hide, this thick leather cape can deflect incoming blows without serious damage. It functions as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Dueling Cape] and while moved into a protective position, it also grants you fire resistance equal to twice the relic's number of gifts.
